heisig_story: From its original meaning of a defined area or zone, a range has also come to mean a grazing land where cowboys roam and do whatever it is they do with cows. When the herds have all been driven to market, there is a great homecoming fiesta like that pictured here. As soon as the cowboys come home, home on the range, the first thing they do is kiss the ground (the mouth on the floor), and then get on with the fiesta.

humanum_full_description_en:
From " earth " to " or ". "Shuowen" thought it was " or " or body. " Or " is mostly borrowed as a function word, and " domain " is used to indicate a region or a field. Such as "Zhou Li. Land official. "Da Situ": "Using the map of the world and the land, we know the area of Kyushu, the number of wide wheels, and distinguish the famous things of the mountains, forests, rivers, and hills." "Han Feizi. "Solving the old": "Husbands and tigers have domains, and their movements are sometimes. Avoiding their domains and saving time will avoid the harm of their tigers."

" Domain " also means a cemetery. "Guang Ya. "Shi Qiu": "The domain, the burial place." Such as "The Book of Songs. Tang Feng. "Ge Sheng": "Ge Sheng Mongolian thorns, vines in the domain." Zheng Xuanjian: "Domain, the burial domain." "The Yan Family Instructions. "Final System": "If you are afraid to worship and do not know the domain, you should build a low wall around the left and right, and it will be a private note."
